rdf:Description.dc:title: The Luzumiyat of Abu’l-Ala
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Abu’l-Ala Al-Maarri (973–1057)
rdf:Description.dc:rights: This eBook is for the use of anyone anywhere at no cost and with almost no restrictions whatsoever.
